org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.state

Interface EvaluationFunctionStateFactory<T extends Serializable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CloneStateEvaluationFunctionFactory

    public interface EvaluationFunctionStateFactory<T extends Serializable>
extends Serializable
    Interface for the creation or reuse of EvaluationFunctions in a MultiStepEvaluationFunction
    Author:
    Erwin Wagasow Created by Erwin Wagasow on 07.08.2018

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EvaluationFunction<T> create()
      Creates or resets an instance of a EvaluationFunction to be used in the MultiStepEvaluationFunction.
      Collection<String> getChannelIdentifiers()
      Collects all channel identifiers that are used in the inner EvaluationFunction.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        EvaluationFunction<T> create()
        Creates or resets an instance of a EvaluationFunction to be used in the MultiStepEvaluationFunction.
        Returns:
        an instance of EvaluationFunction

      • getChannelIdentifiers

        Collection<String> getChannelIdentifiers()
        Collects all channel identifiers that are used in the inner EvaluationFunction.
        Returns:
        a List or Collection that contains all channel identifiers that are used.
